js.to:
delete V.robin_kicked_out; switch(V.bait_forest_shop_main){case "Butterfly":if (random(1,400) == 1){V.bait_forest_shop = "Gold_Butterfly";}else{switch(random(1,8)){case 1:V.bait_forest_shop = "Monarch_Butterfly";break;case 2:V.bait_forest_shop = "Sulphur_Butterfly";break;case 3:V.bait_forest_shop = "Zebra_Swallowtail_Butterfly";break;case 4:V.bait_forest_shop = "Ulysses_Butterfly";break;case 5:V.bait_forest_shop = "Julia_Butterfly";break;case 6:V.bait_forest_shop = "Red_Admiral_Butterfly";break;case 7:V.bait_forest_shop = "Purple_Emperor_Butterfly";break;case 8:V.bait_forest_shop = "Tree_Nymph_Butterfly";break;}}break;case "Stinkbug":V.bait_forest_shop = "Stinkbug";break;case "Worm":if (random(1,400) == 1){V.bait_forest_shop = "Gold_Worm";}else if(random(1,10) == 1){V.bait_forest_shop = "Enchanted_Nightcrawler";}else{V.bait_forest_shop = "Worm"}break;case "Firefly":if(random(1,10) == 1){V.bait_forest_shop = "Lightning_Bug";}else{V.bait_forest_shop = "Firefly"}break;case "Snail":if (random(1,10) == 1){V.bait_forest_shop = "Glowing_Snail";}else{V.bait_forest_shop = "Snail"}break;case "Grasshopper":if (random(1,400)   == 1){V.bait_forest_shop = "Gold_Grasshopper";}else{V.bait_forest_shop = "Gold_Grasshopper"}break;case "Maggot":V.bait_forest_shop = "Maggot";break;}V.fishing_request_selection = Math.floor(Math.random()*32); V.fishing_request_finished_daily = false;V.fishing_request_fish_obtained = false;
if (V.fishing_request_selection == 0 && V.Amanita_Fungifin == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 1 && V.Angelfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 2 && V.Batfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 6 && V.Catfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 7 && V.Cloudfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 8 && V.Clownfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 9 && V.Demonic_Hellfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 10 && V.Derpfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 11 && V.Dirtfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 12 && V.Dynamite_Fish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 13 && V.Fallen_Starfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 14 && V.Fish_of_Cthulhu == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 15 && V.Fishotron == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 16 && V.Guide_Voodoo_Fish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 17 && V.Harpyfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 18 && V.Hungerfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 19 && V.Jewelfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 20 && V.Mudfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 21 && V.Scarab_Fish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 22 && V.Scorpio_Fish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 23 && V.Slimefish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 24 && V.Spiderfish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 25 && V.Tropical_Barracuda == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 26 && V.Wyverntail == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 27 && V.Zombie_Fish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 28 && V.Brimlish == true || V.fishing_request_selection == 29 && V.Eutrophic_Sandfish == true || js._comment101: 每天6点时刷新任务鱼和森林商店小动物家具小种类，重置每日“已完成任务”与“已获得过任务鱼”的状态，并检测当日是否已经持有与今日任务要求相同的任务鱼（泰拉瑞亚机制中，理论上任务鱼只能携带一条，当日提交任务后无法再钓到当日任务鱼）

js.to: statChange.worldCorruption("soft", V.world_corruption_hard);V.bait_forest_shop_received = false;if (random(1,3) == 1){V.bait_butterfly_chance = false;V.bait_stinkbug_chance = random(1,13);if (random(1,5) == 1){V.bait_stinkbug_chance = false;}} else {V.bait_stinkbug_chance = false;V.bait_butterfly_chance = random(1,20);if (random(1,5) == 1){V.bait_butterfly_chance = false;}}if (V.bait_butterfly_chance > 0 && random(1,V.bait_butterfly_chance) == 1){V.bait_forest_shop_main = "Butterfly";} if (V.bait_stinkbug_chance > 0 && random(1,V.bait_stinkbug_chance) == 1){V.bait_forest_shop_main = "Stinkbug";} if (V.bait_forest_shop_main != "Butterfly" && V.bait_forest_shop_main != "Stinkbug"){switch (random(1,5)){case 1:V.bait_forest_shop_main = "Worm";break;case 2:V.bait_forest_shop_main = "Firefly";break;case 3:V.bait_forest_shop_main = "Snail";break;case 4:V.bait_forest_shop_main = "Grasshopper";break;case 5:V.bait_forest_shop_main = "Maggot";break;}}
